???????::

"Hot?  I'll show you hot!"  The still-smoldering craft suddenly comes 
to life, transforming into a somewhat blocky humanoid form.  The 
newcomer is a midget - for a Guardian Robot.  16 feet tall, and 
clearly heavily armed and armored, this is one dangerous femme.  And 
she's in a foul mood.  "Who are you?"

Lacking any insignia, the only clue to alignment is her structural 
resemblance to the legendary Omega Supreme.  Her color pattern is 
much different: mostly black, with deep blue trim.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Darkangel : :
> Darkangel transformes to bot mode, landing next to Dreadplague.
> Darkangel: I cant see any offhand. It's still to hot to touch or 
get close too.
>  Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:The lady transforms to wyvern mode 
and lands near to the object.
> Hopping around, she tries to look for anything that might reveal its
> nature but finds nothing of the sort.
> 
> Dreadplague: There is definitely something Cybertronian on that 
thing,
> but I can't find it. Do you see any hatch or airlock?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > 
> > : : Drakangel : :
> > He flies after the point of empact.
> > Darkangel: Yeah, I'm picking something up. It could ahve been a 
pod
> or a ship. C'mon Dreadplague, lets check this out.
> >  Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:Dreadplague: Slag! What was 
that?!?
> > 
> > She moves in closer but was still at a good distance.
> >

the

wrote:
> > > OOC: How about splitting the difference down the middle 
somewhere?

> > > 
> > > Out in space, a small, damaged rocket ship plunges down into 
the

into a

Tripred

> > > > OOC: I though they were going for the Pred base. They should 
be

the

let's
